text: Typhoon Bopha (aka Typhoon Pablo) was a severe tropical cyclone in December 2012. It hit the Philippines. The typhoon struck Palau first. It destroyed homes and caused power outages. The storm did a lot of damage to the Philippine island of Mindanao. Over 600 deaths were reported. The names Pablo and Bopha were retired because of the large number of deaths and the great destruction. title: Typhoon Bopha
